kpi_info.title: Average utilization of MSRNs
kpi_info.use: Average utilization of MSRNs per MSRN Groups. Average utilization means average number of simultaneously reserved MSRNs. Calculated by dividing total sum of MSRN reservation times with the length of the measurement period. (Erlang) Measured object: MSRN Group Updated when SIFIC ack is sent or MSRN timer expires.
